response.overview: Hamza, a 30-year-old chef and extremist, chases people who harm the common good of the earth and his fellows. He lives secluded in an apartment in the center of Cologne. Hamza’s only reference person is a old hippie, who helps him find the right targets. The two belong to a radical underground organization called “Earth Keeper” by the international media. In the course of the story, Hamza is haunted by a mysterious young woman with turquoise hair.
response.title: Todeskuss
